name: chorus
description: A harmony-based music composition toolkit with MIDI I/O
author: Adam Murray <adam@compusition.com>

scripts.lint: npx eslint --config etc/.eslintrc.js index.js utils.js midi model names structure test web --ignore-pattern web/index.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run coveralls
scripts.docs: node etc/preprocess-tutorials && npx jsdoc --configure etc/jsdoc.json && cat etc/jsdoc-additional-styles.css >> docs/styles/jsdoc-default.css
scripts.docs-watch: nodemon -w README.md -w etc -w examples -w midi -w model -w names -w structure -w index.js -w utils.js -e js,json,css,md -x npm run docs
